metadata.description: Spine-snapping horror in the tradition of the movie The Ring! When an average joe strolls down the street after a fight with his girlfriend, a random stranger TAGS him, handing off an ancient pagan curse! Now he's literally dead -- and rotting -- as he sees his body begin to decompose every day before his very eyes. Cursed, he must either surrender, or find the next victim to TAG... A new mini-series from white-hot Wizard Magazine favorite Keith Giffen and 30 Days of Night Bloodsucker Tales artist Kody Chamberlain!
metadata.name: Tag
